original_text: I heard the sound of the living things' wings as they touched each other. I also heard the loud noise of the wheels that were at the side of the living things. It was like the noise of thunder.
korean_text: 이는 생물들의 날개가 서로 부딪치는 소리와 생물 곁의 바퀴 소리라 크게 울리는 소리더라

sentences.original_text: I heard the sound of the living things' wings
I also heard the loud noise of the wheels
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 바퀴들의 큰 소리를 들었다

sentences.original_text: that were at the side of the living things
It was like the noise of thunder
